title: MMA fighter charged with killing ex-girlfriend & others, escapes as prison van stops at McDonalds
itunes:title: MMA fighter charged with killing ex-girlfriend & others, escapes as prison van stops at McDonalds
description:
A former mixed-marshal arts fighter accused of at least two murders escaped from a prisoner transport van in Texas when the driver stopped for food at a McDonalds. Cedric Marks is the ex-boyfriend of a woman whose remains were found along with those of her male friend inside of a fire pit in Oklahoma. Nancy Grace explores the case with Atlanta juvenile judge and lawyer Ashley Willcott, former detective Steven Lampley, psychologist Caryn Stark, and Crime Stories reporter.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
